name: Marktonator
description:
Marktonator! A game where you have to click Mark. to gain points! Avoid clicking notmark and see how far can you get to! 

Entry for the first MARKJAM - You can check the Newgrounds release HERE, it's preferable since it has leaderboards and medals, you can go back to the main menu pressing BACKSPACE and die pressing R

HELLO! Finally my first released game :)

Game made in 1-week/week-and-half made with Kaboom, prolly will be updated at some point in the future to end up polishing some bits

Also, sorry that this page looks genuinely so bad,,

Source code: https://github.com/AmySpark-ng/Marktonator

—AmySpark
